mapper.select: SELECT ledger_member.id, ledger_member.uuid, ledger_member.create_time, ledger_member.update_time, ledger_member.ledger_id, ledger_member.user_id, `user`.nickname AS nickname, `user`.avatar AS avatar FROM ledger_member LEFT JOIN `user` ON ledger_member.user_id = `user`.uuid ${ew.customSqlSegment}
